alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:52PM MST until November 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR KAIBAB PLATEAU FROM 5 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet on the Kaibab Plateau, the North Rim of the Grand Canyon, and near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 PM Wednesday to 5 PM Thursday: Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
